title: Teares on the death of Meliades
author: Drummond, William, 1585-1649.
publisher: Printed by Andro Hart, and are to be sold at his shop on the north-side of the high streete, a litle beneath the Crosse,
notes: Signed at end: W. Dr., i.e. William Drummond.
On the death of Henry Frederick, Prince of Wales.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
